text: us ne jawaab diya ke aye meri qaum ke logo! zara batao to agar main apne rub ki taraf se kisi mazboot daleel par hoa aur us ne mujhe apne paas ki rehmath ata ki ho, phir agar main ne us ki na farmani karli to kaun hai jo us ke muqable mein meri madad kare? tum to mera nuqsaan hee bada rahe ho
